Articles.Content:
This is a jet I made a time back but I think I could upload a post about it. It might not look stock, but its completely stock because the mods I used were only visual mods like kerbpaint and hotrocket (there were some other but they were also visual). This is a really stable jet and it is capable of some stunts. This is a video about the plane. The real stunts start around 1:00.

Check out my Youtube channel because it has other jet and plane videos on it.

Here's the download if you want to fly it yourself:

http://www./view/lz3dkfpaxi76bjy/Fighter__Eris_.craft

If you want me to build replicas of other jets or planes just tell me.

Edited August 22, 2014 by manni01
Nice plane, downloaded. It would be pretty awesome if you had a replica of the F-18.
Ok. I'll build a f-18 Hornet next
